concept.title: 522.1503 Procedures for acquiring end products on the List of Products Requiring Contractor Certification as to Forced or Indentured Child Labor.

conbody.p: Refer matters for investigation under FAR 22.1503(e) to the appropriate Office of Inspector General Field Office.
